pros: Idyllic small community. If you want to accomplish something, you can make it happen here. Great library resources, great interactive student community, administration is supportive and flexible.
cons: Salaries that start small and stay there. Small campus means small staff, so expect to do a lot of work yourself that at larger institutions you'd have dedicated staff doing for you. No TAs to help grade or run classes. College could do a much better job of being an intellectual gathering place for the community.

pros: Fantastic people, for the most part. As a professor, you’ll really get to know your students and follow their progress. Also a good amount of academic freedom.
cons: No perks at this campus. No lunch discount, no pool, no theater, barely any arts or non-sport activities at all to speak of. Leadership is lacking; not clear what the vision for the future is. A few staff members are very hard to work with, and of course the salary is below median.

pros: If you enjoy small towns and narrow-minded people this college is perfect for you. Higher Ed doesn’t mean they hire the best and brightest
cons: A president that is way out of her league. Senior staff that had no loyalty to anything but the adulation of Ronald Reagan and will fire people with decades long of service yet keep a woman convicted of a sexual indecency charge with a board member for in a public park.
No pension; few raises and cost of living adjustments

pros: Small community, very tight knit, great friendships made here
cons: College doesn't spend where spending is necessary to grow enrollment effectively

review_title: This place will close in the very near future
pros: Small campus for sheltered, small-minded people due to lack of any leadership at the top.
cons: No, none, nada leadership. A sinking ship. They hold up Reagan as their only pro to attend.

job_title: Strings Festivals Administrator/Instructor/Performer in Urbana, IL
pros: An Idyllic setting with good facilities, safe and focus on student needs
cons: This position is part time employment.
